titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir Maurice Eustace Knight, His Maiesties serjeant at law in the kingome of Ireland, and speaker of the House of Commons, in Parliament there being a perfect relation of the last true newes from Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Eustace, Maurice, Sir, ca. 1590-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G. for I. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Signed & dated at end: Dublin April 24, 1642 ... Mau. Eustace.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
